attributes.action: Just leave the EU on 29th as was originally intended Deal or Not!!
attributes.additional_details: This should have been the message to EU all along and our negitiations position would have been stronger. As this has not been done with any expertise we are left with a mess and we should just leave, forward fixing any issues. Scaremongers are only raising risks and that is all they are. No one actually knows if any of the issues will surface... The EU needs the UK more than the other way around in terms of trade!
attributes.background:
Given most MPs never intended to carry out the advisement of the public wanting to leave the EU as a majority we should just leave on the original planned date (29/3/19) 
MPs individual views were heard when they took part in the referendum. Their only job was to get a deal or we leave without one!
